name: Night Terror Amusement Park (NTAP)
description:
EDIT : I ADDED THE WRONG ZIP IT SHOULD BE FIXED!!! 

A short game; The Dream world has been invaded by Seirei, a Yume no Seirei who causes people to have horrible nightmares;  Doremy, who's power has been stripped; decides to confront Seirei After defeating their Accomplices ; and they end up having a battle.

Credits:

ABootToTheHead - Programmer 

Chiptami - OST

Aqwa - Character design

Driftveill - Artist

Due to time constraints we had to cut these two characters by Aqwa but they are Seirei's Accomplices
